about_the_game:
Puzzle as a Circle

In D.O.T, you take on the role of a circle navigating through a series of puzzles intertwined with platforming elements. Your mission is to collect small circles scattered across the environment, each one bringing you closer to unlocking the ultimate goal: the star that opens the gateway to the next level.

Minimalist styles

Embracing a classic graphic style featuring only two unique colors, D.O.T challenges your wit and reflexes as you maneuver through mind-bending puzzles in a minimalist yet captivating world.

Beware of void!

Danger lurks everywhere in D.O.T, and the vacuum system is there to prove it. One false step into the void, and you start the whole level all over again! Watch your jumps!

Two Game Modes to Suit Your Style

  • Chill: Perfect for a more relaxed experience. You can respawn after falling, allowing you to learn the levels at your own pace and enjoy each challenge.

  • One Try: One attempt, one fall, and it’s Game Over. Can you finish the game without a single mistake?

Features

  • Unique Puzzle-Platforming Gameplay: Navigate through challenging levels combining puzzles and platforming mechanics.

  • Minimalist Art Style: Experience a visually striking world designed with just two colors.

  • Adaptive Difficulty: Choose between two modes — Chill for a relaxed experience and One Try for an intense challenge.

  • Precision Mechanics: Master tight controls where every jump and movement matters.

  • Replayability: Test your skills and improve your performance in One Try.

  • Controller Support: Play on a Keyboard and Mouse or even, with your favorite controller!

Puzzle as a Circle

In D.O.T, you take on the role of a circle navigating through a series of puzzles intertwined with platforming elements. Your mission is to collect small circles scattered across the environment, each one bringing you closer to unlocking the ultimate goal: the star that opens the gateway to the next level.

Minimalist styles

Embracing a classic graphic style featuring only two unique colors, D.O.T challenges your wit and reflexes as you maneuver through mind-bending puzzles in a minimalist yet captivating world.

Beware of void!

Danger lurks everywhere in D.O.T, and the vacuum system is there to prove it. One false step into the void, and you start the whole level all over again! Watch your jumps!

Two Game Modes to Suit Your Style

  • Chill: Perfect for a more relaxed experience. You can respawn after falling, allowing you to learn the levels at your own pace and enjoy each challenge.

  • One Try: One attempt, one fall, and it’s Game Over. Can you finish the game without a single mistake?

  • Minimalist Art Style: Experience a visually striking world designed with just two colors.

  • Controller Support: Play on a Keyboard and Mouse or even, with your favorite controller!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Debian / Arch based Distribution
  • Processor: AMD Athlon 3000G
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphic Card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Arch based Distribution
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti | AMD RX 570
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For NVIDIA Graphics card, use the proprietary driver by your package manager.

name: D.O.T Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Athlon 3000G
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphic Card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti | AMD RX 570
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: D.O.T - Master puzzles, platform as a circle!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Dutch
